title: Trump's GOP Grip Weakening? Congress Chaos! #Shorts #Trump #Politics
description:
Is *Trump's* influence over the GOP in Congress slipping? Get the latest breakdown in this Flash News Bite! 

Recent events reveal growing divisions within the Republican party. A shrinking House majority and Senate mavericks are challenging *Trump's* agenda, impacting key issues like foreign policy and health care. Will these internal conflicts derail *Trump's* legislative goals, especially with the upcoming midterm elections looming?

The article highlights instances of Republican lawmakers defying the White House, showcasing the challenges Speaker Johnson faces in maintaining party unity. From the Epstein Files Transparency Act to disagreements on health care subsidies and military action in Venezuela and Greenland, the GOP is grappling with internal discord. Can *Trump* regain control, or are these cracks a sign of a larger power shift within the party?

What do you think? Is this the beginning of the end for *Trump's* control over the GOP?
